name: WHAT'S SO HORRIBLE ABOUT HAVING A CURSE
name_original: WHAT'S SO HORRIBLE ABOUT HAVING A CURSE
description:
You have been cursed by a Vampire Lord! My condolences. If you are to have any hope of ending your curse and escaping an eternity as a lifeless thrall of this Master of Darkness you and your fellow Cursed Adventurers must embark on a Quest to do battle with all manner of monstrosities and vanquish the Vampire Lord.

A hack of What's So Cool About Outer Space by Jared Sinclair and What's So Cool About Lucha Libre by Simon Moody that is inspired by the infamous Castlevania II: Simons Question.

This is a table top role playing game for 2 - 4 players about going on a quest through a monster filled countryside in order to battle with an arcane villain and save your immoral soul.
